title: Domain Bank Seed Entry Schema
description: Schema for domain bank seed entries. Each seed entry represents a foundational piece of knowledge for a specific domain bank.

id.description: Unique identifier for this entry within its bank. Format: {bank}:{kind}:{slug}

bank.description: The domain bank this entry belongs to

kind.description: The type/category of this entry within its bank

content.description: The actual knowledge content of this entry

title.description: Short title or name for this entry

tags.description: Optional tags for categorization and lookup

related_ids.description: IDs of related entries in any bank

tier.description: Memory tier for this seed entry (seeds always go to LTM)

confidence.description: Confidence level for this entry (0.0-1.0). Seeds default to 1.0

source.description: Source or origin of this knowledge (for seeds, always 'seed')

deterministic.description: Whether this entry represents deterministic knowledge

content.title: Second Law of Thermodynamics
content.description: The total entropy of an isolated system can never decrease over time. Entropy can only increase or remain constant in ideal reversible processes.

content.title: Basic Try-Except Pattern
content.description: Deterministic error handling using try-except blocks with specific exception types and explicit error messages.
